document.full_text: a $7.5 billion aid package, intended to bolster pakistan's government and win friends for the united states, is foundering on fears of corruption and incompetence, officials of both nations say.
document.title: u.s. aid plan for pakistan is foundering
lines_and_colors: a $7.5 billion aid package, intended to bolster pakistan's government and win friends for the united states, is foundering on fears of corruption and incompetence, officials of both nations say.
